website_summaries.verdict: Millennium's wide flavor variety is kid-friendly, tasty, and still packs a punch.
pros: Each box comes with 6 different flavors, keeping things interesting
Bar is filling, even for men
These bars have a 5-year shelf life and come with a handy emergency guide
cons: The bars don't have a tab or flap for easy opening

customer_reviews.title: No survival guide and tastes like sawdust
customer_reviews.text: The bars did not arrive with the survival guide. When I contacted the seller, I was told the guide was not included. The description clearly says that it comes with the survival guide. That's false advertising. Not only was I brushed off by the seller about the survival guide not being included, but the bars tasted like sawdust. YUCK!!! Will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Massey

customer_reviews.title: Sounds yummy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about the amount of sugar but it is cheap calories in a bad situation. I got these to stay in the car so the USCG approval was key to choosing this. We live in Florida but have family up north where the snow blows high. I wanted something that could stay in the car regardless of temperature extremes for a year or more. Just something to eat if we were ever stuck in a ditch or snowed in on a Interstate or need something to shove in the mouth of a unruly passenger. This is just one of those I hope I never need it but feel better to have it things.
customer_reviews.author: RJC2u

customer_reviews.title: I'm no expert
customer_reviews.text: Kind of like a block of partially-cooked shortbread with some fruit flavor and vitamin supplements. It does provide almost twice the calories of a regular granola bar and a fraction of the sodium. And it provides vitamins! Most of the calories are from fat, though I don't know how much of a concern that is in an emergency. Keep in mind that it's six bars for one day's nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Loonyhed

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing at all.  Tastes awful.
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today. Stashing for future use, and Im hoping I dont ever need them. Sampled the apricot flavor... Yuck!!!! Could not make myself eat more than half. If you have no food, and no way of getting anything else, this will do, if you can choke it down. Really really dissapointed in these. And for those who say only those who only eat twinkies and stuff hate this...I love the other types of emergency food! Datrex is my fav. Breakfast with coffee. Tastes like a semi sweet shortbread cookie. Was hoping for more of the same, with fruit flavors. Nope! Again....yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: For Survival Only
customer_reviews.text: These taste like garbage. The advantage is that they last for 5 yesrs and can be stored for emergency use. They are mostly sugar with nutrients added in. Spiking blood sugar and insulin combined with other garbage ingredients does not make for healthy eating. One would be better off with dried meats, dried fruit, and nuts. But those don't last as long as this. If there's a catastrophe where there’s the possibility of starving, then enjoy these rather than die. Otherwise eat real food and not garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Charmello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Well packaged and long shelf life
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase - I haven't tried any of them yet so I won't comment on flavor, but I wanted to leave a review to confirm that they arrived well packaged + vacuum sealed, with a 5-year shelf life (manufactured 4/20 and expire 4/25), all different flavors, and with the handy little pamphlet for people like me who are completely unprepared for an emergency (but trying to be better). ;)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: I like that the "MFR Date" and "Expiration Date" are clearly marked on the bar. Most important was that the MFR date was within 2 months of purchase - meaning I'll get a full 5 years before the product begins to deteriorate. I have in the past ordered from other companies and found out the product had been sitting on the shelf for a couple of years - decreasing useful life for me. I have purchased this brand in the past but have never tasted it. The bars are with my emergency supplies. Thus.....I'll hopefully never need them, but it nice to know they are there.
customer_reviews.author: kathytn

customer_reviews.title: Coconut bars...ew!
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum sealed very tightly which is good. My only problem was that the flavors didn't match the pictures. I read other reviews so I already knew apricot was being substituted for orange. But I didn't know the green tropical fruit bar was being substituted for coconut. I absolutely hate coconut! Other than that the product lived up to my expectations with an expiration date well into the future. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what i expected. I will probably just stick with Baby Ruth king size candy bars.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what i expected having purchased the S.O.S food ration previously. The energy bar had the same cookie texture, but with a fruity taste. I don"t think i will purchase again. Probably just stick with a candy bar having the same calories and protein. I generally favor a King Size Baby Ruth candy bar with 500 calories and 8 grams of protein. The Baby Ruth candy bar is cheaper too. One individual food ration cost me a little over 2 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Vince J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing addition to my food storage
customer_reviews.text: S.O.S. Food Labs Millennium Assorted Energy Bars are an amazing addition to my food storage. I purchased the 6 pack to try them out before I invested on buying more...but I do plan to buy more. The bar itself comes in a vacuumed sealed mylar package. The bar is like a cookie but it just melts in your mouth. The bars have the perfect amount of flavor and plenty of calories for a SHTF scenario or if you just want to enjoy them on their own. I definitely plan to purchase more of these in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I only received 5 bars, loose, no box, with a 'how to survive an earthquake' flyer. Have no idea what the expiration date is on these bars.
customer_reviews.author: 1hackmodeller

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor atrocious texture
customer_reviews.text: These are great bars in the sense that they have great flavor and do fill you up. The just have the texture of oily damp sand. The flavors jump out at you after you bite into it but the texture kills any joy you get while eating it. In a dire situation you won't starve and I'm sure if you reach that point you won't care.
customer_reviews.author: Anubis Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good for Long-Term Storage, Pretty Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with these - got the 6 pack and tried the lemon - pretty tasty and definitely rich and filling. I expected them to have a tougher texture than they did as they are sealed very tightly. Like another reviewer said it was good to have something to drink to follow it up with. They are all very recent manufacture (12/17 dated). I received apricot instead of the cherry as listed in the 6-pack description but since the remainder of these are going into vehicle kits for long-term "just in case" scenario it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyThunder

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the energy bars.
customer_reviews.text: The bars do not taste good. They have almost no fiber. Top two ingredients are sugar and palm oil with lots of saturated fat. Lots of gluten. Lots of calories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and was double packaged to ensure no damage to the Mylar wrappers of the bars, which was awesome. I received six flavors which were pretty close to the picture (tropical fruit, cherry, raspberry, apricot, vanilla and lemon). I ate the tropical fruit bar, it had the consistency of a dense short bread. Wasn't too hard or too soft. There was barely a taste of tropical fruit in about every other bite but the bars natural flavor isn't bad either. I would definitely buy these bars again and recommend them for anyone looking to store long term in a get home/bug out bag. They would also be excellent for backpackers or hunting trips.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Prideaux

customer_reviews.title: It'll keep you alive but you won't enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I had read the reviews before I spent money on these. We taste tested the raspberry one. The consistency is like a mixture of chalk and sawdust. It crumbles to tiny pieces when you try to bite it. The artificial raspberry taste was over powering and I'm still trying to get rid of the taste 15 minutes later. It'll keep us from starving to death but that all I can say good about it!
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: Not bad to keep in car or backpack
customer_reviews.text: While these don't taste as good as a regular candy bar or granola bar might, they're not that bad, either. They keep quite awhile without spoiling, which is important if you're using them as "emergency food snack" (or whatever). All-in-all, not a bad compromise between shelf life, nutrition & taste.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for emergency rations
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many different energy bars over the years. I keep coming back to these. They have a much longer shelf life than most others and no chocolate to melt. They taste ok, but I don't buy them for the taste, but rather as emergency food first, taste second, for this they work well. I will buy them again. They get vacuum sealed and stuck under the seats of the vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Like Compressed Sawdust
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find the bars particularly filling, which isn't too surprising given the high percentage of carbs. The texture was a drawback for me. They are rock hard, and are like highly compressed fine sawdust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slight issues, but excellent choice for emergency rations.
customer_reviews.text: Tried the lemon bar...very tasty. Lemon flavor is there, but not super strong. Tiny bit crumbly, but similar to any type of bar. VERY well packaged, had to use my EDCknife to open. Only mark is the taste of coconut is there. Faint, but it’s there. Overall...very good. Seller got the order out quickly, willing to work on customizing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McMullin

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try them out so my son and I both had one. Good ending to this story as I went and ordered some more. They will be kept for emergencies. Very well packed in tight vacuum wrapper which is very tough but I can still open at my age. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These taste way better than your average survival slab. The individual packaging makes them easer to deal with. I use them now as my "granola" bar. I can't eat most of those due to allergies. These are a less expensive alternative to those and to candy bars. I ended up ordering a 24 count pack and then ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Reston Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Quick Energy when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep as emergency food in my EDC bag. I sampled a few and, to be honest, they were pretty good. Most bars like this taste like cardboard and wax, so these were a definite improvement. I plan to buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Parks

customer_reviews.title: Only 5 bars in the box at fist then reorder ok but nothing to write home about
customer_reviews.text: I might change my rating after trying them out, but in the meantime, I have to go through the return/reorder 2-step. Annoying. Update after reordering: received the 6. Convenient and well packaged. Don't expect to be wowed by the taste or texture, but I guess it checks the sustenance box...
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: These may not be the tastiest food bars but they ...
customer_reviews.text: These may not be the tastiest food bars but they are okay and filled with plenty of nutrients and calories. Exactly what you need as an essential part of a 72 hour (or more) survival bag. They came with almost a full 5 years until expiration. I've been putting together "bug out bags" for years and thay have always had Millennium Energy Bars as one of three or more food sources. I will continue to purchase these as part of my survival bags.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Ray Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good taste not so good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The taste is not bad at all but the ingredients are all bad. The bars are Vacuum wrapped so I’m not sure why these couldn’t be made with a little more quality ingredients. Maybe lower the shelf life just a little???
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Will not only meet your calorie needs, but they taste great, too!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great for your bug out bag, food storage, 72 hour emergency kits, or even backpacking and hunting trips. My first experience with these bars was on a deer hunting trip several years ago, and they were almost all I ate while out on the trail. They're light, compact, and keep very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jembo888

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Filling
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 12 pack to keep several bars in each of a couple 2 night/20 mile backpacks. I sampled several flavors. The taste is very mild in the flavor featured on the label. They are very similar in flavor and texture to the SOS lifeboat rations. For me this is a good thing as I enjoy them. I will be purchasing more as I build more kits or use them up hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Solid addition to your kit.
customer_reviews.text: These bars pretty much exactly what you would expect. Dense shortbread style bars with a bit of flavor. They were very edible and I plan on making it part of my emergency preparations since they come in a variety of flavors. Obviously you will have a favorite flavor and a hated one, so I do recommend grabbing the sampler and giving it a whack before investing heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Blake J. Alter

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste, Good Price, Good Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for bug out bag for home and cars. Storage length not known from experience, but manufacturer claims storage duration appropriate for bug out bag. Amazon delivery via prime was great as always.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Emergency only.
customer_reviews.text: They are okay. Not sure if I'd call them an energy bar. I also would not eat these as a meal replacement because of the chalky like dryness texture. Good thing they have a long shelf life (yet to be tested) cause I'll only eat them if absolutely needed to.
customer_reviews.author: nzbc

customer_reviews.title: They might taste horrible. But if they do and the apocalypse comes
customer_reviews.text: Another thing that goes into my emergency kit that I hope I never have to use. I haven't tried eating any of them so I don't know how they taste. They might taste horrible. But if they do and the apocalypse comes, I can at least look at them and think, "wow the packaging is so nice and colorful, it reminds me of the good ol' days."
customer_reviews.author: Ruby L.

customer_reviews.title: Long shelf life
customer_reviews.text: I can’t see what it is since I’ve bought them for my emergency shelter bag for knowing that these will last for a long time puts our mind at ease. We’l update if we ever actually have to use it
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Finally opened one of these up a few months ago. Cherry I think. Tasted good, and satisfied the hunger. Ordered a 6 pack this time.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Huntoon

customer_reviews.title: I am having a hard time not eati g th
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight high calorie food for my go bag. I tried the six pack of these bars out. I decided to try two of them and put four in my bag. I wanted to know how they tasted. These actually taste very good for a high calorie food bar. They are like over sized thick cookies. I've already eaten two more! If youre looking for something compact and high calorie for emergency food or hiking or whatever, i would definitely give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Morton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic packaging...
customer_reviews.text: I got a six pack of these to run in a quick deployment bag. Bag rides with me all the time in case I need a quick snack if my shift turns into an all day affair with no food access. I have not tried these yet but they are extremely well sealed and keep there shape. This was important to me because I have limited real estate in the pack I use. These are/or appear to be a great addition! The quick survival reference was a great added bonus. Worth the purchase and I will be purchasing again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moser

customer_reviews.title: A solid option
customer_reviews.text: Got these to keep for emergencies and took one on a backpacking trip to see how they taste and it was pretty good, Like an orange flavored pecan sandy. A solid option for emergency food.
customer_reviews.author: Trail JunkieTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: dry bar
customer_reviews.text: These are crumbly and dry, but I like the calories in them. I will purchase more. Just good to have around for snack or survival.
customer_reviews.author: valleyboy

customer_reviews.title: Tested and approved.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes decent and gets the job done. Didn't kill me and kept me relatively full for a half day. I'll try one at the expiration date and adjust review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Very long lasting (10+ years)
customer_reviews.text: I had some bars I forgot about from 2011. They were supposed to have expired in 2016 but I opened one and it was fine. As long as they remain vacuum sealed and not too hot or cold they last very long. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Baerg

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergency bags
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good, not thirst provoking at all. The dates on mine were 5 years out. Will always buy again when needing to rotate stock.
customer_reviews.author: LBK

customer_reviews.title: Not very flavorful, but filling.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a bit more of the fruit flavor, but the labeled fruit flavor was lost in the bland wheat/coconut flavor. So no temptation to use them as snacks. They are in the glove box as actual emergency food.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of flavors, 5 year shelf life. Good for emergency.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't eaten one, but they look more varied and interesting than the usual 5 year.emergency food bars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TASTES GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: IF they really last as long as they say this is a good product for short term survival (a few days). Too much sugar for long term.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bars for Emergency bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love the candy bar type packaging which makes it easy to pack and to share. I am using mine for emergency bags so I really don't think taste will matter in a true emergency. I will be glad to have something to sustain me. The taste however is per person...but I do like them. Thanks so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Annie's Corner

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for survival food.
customer_reviews.text: Some flavors are better than others. They are small and easy to just put in a drawer and where.
customer_reviews.author: Zax

customer_reviews.title: Good for a bug out bag or an edc  bag
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of flavors and work great in a pinch when you dont have time.to eat or are out hiking. Flavor isnt the best but it will get you to your next meal.
customer_reviews.author: The dude

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: The bars are late date, packaged quite well. The flavor is excellent but they are a very dry bar. I understand this is needed to make them last. Use plenty of water with them.
customer_reviews.author: john gomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast product was sealed properly, not planning on trying them unless I have to LOL
customer_reviews.author: Weniki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavors and variety thereof. Even the scouts loved them. Definetly reordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EDC food
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried one yet but keep a couple in my bag just in case. Long shelf life so I will have to eat them eventually and get some more.
customer_reviews.author: Casey F. LaCasse

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. These are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: 1) Rock hard bricks. 2) The consistency/texture of the energy bar is grainy. Literally like sand glued together. 3) The flavor is minimal, and they all taste very similar. The maker of these needs to rethink their recipe. There are better options out there. I gave three stars because I received all 6 ordered, and the packaging is quality. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah D.

customer_reviews.title: They also replaced the ones I like, with the worst flavors
customer_reviews.text: Well, i got the product, but the flavors sent are not the ones listed in the description. They also replaced the ones I like, with the worst flavors. A bit of a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my least favorite flavor [cherry] just became my favorite because of these bars
customer_reviews.text: taste good, i know their emergency bars but my emergency was being to busy to eat at work so as emergency bars for my need, they pass
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Observer

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sister. They're good for five years. Size of a normal protein bar (Except these are more of candy bars. Which is okay). Six of these fit in her purse. A worthwhile buy
customer_reviews.author: Tai Alexander Jones

customer_reviews.title: energy bars
customer_reviews.text: really chewy, but they do give the energy burst you need.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting shelf life and many flavors
customer_reviews.text: These bars are a good item to have in your hurricane supply bag, I have no complaints and they seem to last a long time in storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended so great
customer_reviews.text: Depends on what flavors you like but the flavors taste like intended. Especially lemon and blueberry. The texture is kinda like dried peanut butter or compact cinnamon bars. Mostly the flavor is in the aftertaste which is surprisingly good. A+
customer_reviews.author: Yeet

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting bars!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting bars I've tried yet and strongest real flavors, yeah sounds strange but the cherry tastes like cherry not chalk like some others or just a mild flavoring.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Finally Tasty Emergency Food Bars
customer_reviews.text: The flavors sound very tasty, bars are well packaged, last 5 years, and arrived fast. Just what I needed for my daughter's emergency kit for school.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: The energy bars arrived right on time. I’ve stuck them in my survivors kit in case we have an earthquake. I didn’t taste them but I suppose they’ll be OK. Sorry I can’t give you a more definitive review
customer_reviews.author: palm springs retiree

customer_reviews.title: They have good fruit flavor and roughly 400 calories of nourishment to ...
customer_reviews.text: For an extended hike these bars should be just the ticket. They have good fruit flavor and roughly 400 calories of nourishment to help replenish energy. Happy I found them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: I opened one of the coconut bars and I found a large hair in it. No to happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Boaz

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Keep these in my edc bag. They taste okay. Give me heartburn but that doesn't matter. They're for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: These are a must.
customer_reviews.text: This is something that just can`t go wrong. These Energy Bars are the best. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Tastes bad but do the job.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but they taste bad. I tried two different flavors. I keep them in my bug out bag.
customer_reviews.author: ryan sparks

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as granola bars
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the product for testing of quality taste and ingredients for an emergency kit. So I ended up taking them to work for a snack, two bars got me through the entire day. I like the product so I'm going to put in a larger order.
customer_reviews.author: P.White

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: A good product- I hope. Have not needed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: gary rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a lot of chances to work with these yet but the grandkids ate them so I'm calling that a win.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Helms

customer_reviews.title: Long life in a nice size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a supplement to other food for an emergency backpack. Like that these are small and can fit in spaces that the big block food cannot. Also nice to have some variety of flavors. I have not tasted these, so I can not review the taste.
customer_reviews.author: L. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good flavor, texture is a little weird. Overall I would recommend these for go bags and such.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to keep in our 72 hour packs. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep in our 72 hour packs. Arrived undamaged and quickly! Haven’t eaten one yet, but I assume if I’m at the point I need to, I won’t care much about taste;)
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: When i opened the first of these, i kinda expected them to be virtually edible particleboard. I was pleasantly surprised to be wrong. Instead, they remind me of a dense, sweet cookie, like shortbread, only these have nice, mild flavors. Looking forward to the opportunity to try a few more.
customer_reviews.author: AT.S.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty little cookie.
customer_reviews.text: Got these a few weeks back and decided to open one up and see how they are. My 4 year old tried a few bites and have me a thumbs up then I took a bite.....not bad. Definitely delicious in and emergency situation. It's heavily a lightly flavored cookie. Might have to order another batch.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought the assorted flavors to test these out. Overall they aren't bad, the texture is a bit dry and crumbly but I didn't mind it too much. I would recommend testing them yourself before buying a huge box to use for emergency rations though.
customer_reviews.author: No Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Great survival bar
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in my get home bag and bug out bag for emergencies. Tasted them in the past and they are really good.
customer_reviews.author: NEEVZ

customer_reviews.title: not bad, just lack flavor
customer_reviews.text: These bars weren't to bad. I expected them to taste like sawdust, but they were very palatable. The only downside is that they could use more flavoring for whatever labeled flavor they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ringenoldus

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite "didn't have time to get something" bars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite "didn't have time to get something" bars. I always keep a few in my truck, hunting gear and desk at work. Taste good, texture is ok.
customer_reviews.author: battybat

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for survival
customer_reviews.text: so far we have tasted a few of them and I would say they are tasty enough to eat in a needed situation. Of which most of the time I am not in.
customer_reviews.author: racrdug

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste and texture is the worst that I’d ever tasted; reminded me of the old oatmeal bars in the MREs from the military.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN LACKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition with Tips for Survival booklet a real plus. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DKSH

customer_reviews.title: I only received 5 bars even though I ordered 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I only received 5 bars even though I ordered 6. I haven't eaten any yet as they are part of my evac kit.
customer_reviews.author: David Wellborn

customer_reviews.title: Emergency Car Kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put in mine and my daughters car kit.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi, NY

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste great! Just like the fruit they are made from and the flavor doesn’t get tiring. The texture of the bars is a bit grainy not like fruit leather, however the bars are filling and yet not heavy on the stomach the way that other energy bars can be.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Good allergy labeling
customer_reviews.text: I like the long lasting shelf life of these bars. I throw a couple in each of our cars as emergency food. They do a good job of allergy labeling so these are our go-to in emergency scenarios. Some other bars last longer but don’t do as well with the labeling. Taste is fine. In the right situation that’s not really a concern.
customer_reviews.author: J A Gshwandtner

customer_reviews.title: Great add to your emergency kit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to add to a home emergency kit. They were packaged very well. Got one out to try and was suprised at the taste. Was expecting it to be like eating chalk but was actually not bad. Very filling to get you back up and going. Definitely a good add to any emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Deacon7517

customer_reviews.title: Far better than comparable products that I've sampled in the past
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have as part of my emergency supplies in my car. I tried one bar just to know what to expect and I was surprised at how delicious and satisfying it was! Far better than comparable products that I've sampled in the past. I'm very happy and will be buying these bars again in the future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BC Rees

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for long lasting food for earthquake supplies. These were recommended
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: No Emergency guide.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for taste. Mine arrived without the Emergency guide like stated in the description. Be careful of the wrapping,as it is not very thick, so it can get ripped and loose it's 5 year expiration fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fighting zombies requires enegy
customer_reviews.text: They are what they're supposed to be. They are not steak or a buffet plate but they fill the hole and are tasty with enough variety in taste you won't dread the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Scrooge McDuck

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The reason I took one star off is because these are a bit hard to open other than that a very excellent product very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Shaun G.

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum sealing is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum sealing is amazing. And the taste is OK for emergency food.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Eliahou

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to count
customer_reviews.text: Decent taste, but only received 5 bars instead of the 6 in the prepacked box.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Nice package good flavor selection
customer_reviews.text: The are for a go bag so I haven't eaten them but they are nicely packaged
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Surprising taste
customer_reviews.text: Actually taste good. It has a crunchy texture like brittle. Not that bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Lurch

customer_reviews.title: deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I read six bars. Just show six bars then.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my emergency car kit, based on other favorable reviews. Appreciate the variety of flavors and how quickly my order arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency bars
customer_reviews.text: Very filling bars with assorted flavors. A bit chalky on the texture, but for a high calorie bar, it was good. Put one in a smoothie and that worked great as well for a meal replacement with veggies and fruit.
customer_reviews.author: David Terkel

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tried the lemon flavor and it was great and filling. Planning to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: they taste pretty good and the consistency is like a sugar cookie ...
customer_reviews.text: Only tried a couple so far, they taste pretty good and the consistency is like a sugar cookie or shortbread cookie. They do have a bit of a 'sugar high' energy effect if you eat one all at once. I would probably split it and use it as 2 servings or have it with some other food to reduce that blood sugar high/low bounce. Didnt make me thirsty, but might if you are in a water rationing scenario and already in a semi-dehydration state. Will update when I've eaten all the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: J. harig

product_meta.title: Millennium Assorted Energy Bars (6 Count) - Long Shelf Life Fruit flavored Bar Bundle - Survival Pack for Calamity, Disaster, Hiking and Meal replacement
product_meta.description: Size:6 PackLooking for a high-quality, great-tasting emergency food bar? If so, the New Millennium Energy Bar is a great option for your emergency supplies. This emergency food bar has a five year shelf life, is US Coast Guard approved and holds up to hot and cold temperatures. Simply put, it’s the best emergency food ration you can have. These emergency food bars are designed to provide a quick, nutritious source of energy in an emergency. Make sure to add these calorie food bars to your survival kit list. They're about the size of a regular candy bar and ideal for school, office and home kits.
feature_bullets: LONG SHELF LIFE - It is strictly made with long expiration date for up to 5 years even if you stock in a long period of time the taste is still the same crunchy and fresh that keeps you nourished and alive. Each bar contains over 400 calories!

VARIETY FLAVORS - These are very tasty and filling it comes with different fruity flavors Lemon, Raspberry, Raspberry, Cherry, Tropical fruit, Orange flavored bars. It won’t make you thirsty or dry out your mouth. You will receive 6 different flavors.

DURABLE PACKAGING - The packing is absolutely Mylar vacuumed packed and BPA-free which preserved them crunchy, safe and fresh to eat. No worries about broken packaging this is very well sealed solid plastic.

UNIVERSALLY NEEDED – These is a very good substitute if ever you are in an emergency situation like calamity, out of food, camping, boating, hiking and more outdoor or indoor activities. These are ready to eat, non-perishable for adults and for kids.
PERFECT GIFT - Excellent gift for your friends, kids or to anyone in your life. Survival tips inside for you and for your family.
